XRRenderStateBaseLayer.summary:
The read-only baseLayer property of the
interface returns the instance
that is the source of bitmap images and a description of how the image is to be rendered
in the device.

remarks.para:
This property is read-only; however, you can indirectly change its
value using .

XRRenderStateBaseLayer.value:
A object which is used as the source of the world's
contents when rendering each frame of the scene.See the examples below to see how to use {{domxref("XRSession.updateRenderState",
"updateRenderState()")}} to set the current XRWebGLLayer used for rendering
the scene.
